net.richarddawkins.watchmaker.morphs.mono.geom

Class Pic

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.richarddawkins.watchmaker.morphs.mono.geom.Pic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Phenotype
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BiomorphPic

    public abstract class Pic
extends java.lang.Object
implements Phenotype

    Pic

    A Pic represents an ordered list of drawing primitives, generally lines (the class Lin)

    Original sources

    Monochrome WatchMaker/Globals (253:259)

            Pic = RECORD
   BasePtr: Ptr;
   MovePtr: LinPtr;
   Origin: Point;
   PicSize: Integer;
   PicPerson: person
   END;

    Colour Watchmaker/Common_Exhibition.p (280:286)

            Pic = record
         BasePtr: Ptr;
         MovePtr: LinPtr;
         Origin: Point;
         PicSize: INTEGER;
         PicPerson: person
        end;

    Snails/Globals (280:286)

            Pic = RECORD
   BasePtr: Ptr;
   MovePtr: LinPtr;
   Origin: Point;
   PicSize: Integer;
   PicPerson: person
  END;
    Author:
    alan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.Vector<Lin> lines 
      Morph morph 
      static int PICSIZEMAX
      PICSIZEMAX is 4 * 4095, which is 4 times the original (Pascal) value, since the current implementation stores each component of a symmetry separately, instead of calculating them as they're drawn.

    • Field Detail

      • PICSIZEMAX

        public static final int PICSIZEMAX
        PICSIZEMAX is 4 * 4095, which is 4 times the original (Pascal) value, since the current implementation stores each component of a symmetry separately, instead of calculating them as they're drawn.
        See Also:
